titleStmt.title: Theophania, or, Severall modern histories represented by way of romance and politickly discours'd upon / by an English person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Sales, W., Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Newcomb for Thomas Heath, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir W. Sales. Cf. Notes and queries, Jan., 1852, p. 88; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
